Title: Movie Gallery
Description: All your movies listed in a nice styled Metro experience! It scans your chosen directories for various video files and looks up the metadata from IMDB before putting them all in a database.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

All your movies listed in a nice styled Metro experience! It scans your chosen directories for various video files and before putting them all in a database it looks up the metadata from IMDB.

 

Technical Information

To develop the application the following items are used:

  • Visual C#
  • .NET 4.0 (Full)
  • Visual Studio 2010
  • WPF
  • MahApps.Metro
  • MVVM Light Toolkit
  • SQL Server CE 3.5

 

Application Requirements

So far known requirements to run the program:

  • .NET 4.0 (Full)
  • Windows 7 (maybe Vista)
